jchart

Class JChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jchart.JChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JBarChart, JBoxChart, JLineChart, JPieChart, JScatterChart

    public abstract class JChart
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This the main abstract class of the JChart library and is an extension of the JPanel class.
    Author:
    Mees Mosseveld
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • chartSetTitle

        public void chartSetTitle(java.lang.String title,
                          int alignment,
                          int position)
        Set the title of the chart.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the chart. When null no title is shown.
        alignment - The alignment of the title: JChart.TITLE_ALIGNMENT_LEFT, JChart.TITLE_ALIGNMENT_CENTER or JChart.TITLE_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
        position - The position of the title: JChart.TITLE_POSITION_TOP or JChart.TITLE_POSITION_BOTTOM

      • chartGetTitle

        Returns:
        The title of the chart.

      • chartSetLegendEnabled

        public void chartSetLegendEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable the legend of the chart.
        Parameters:
        enabled - When true, the legend will be shown. When false, the legend will not be shown.

      • chartAddDataSet

        public boolean chartAddDataSet(java.lang.String dataSetName,
                               java.awt.Color color)
        Add a data set to the chart. A data set is a set of points or values that represent the same entity.
        Parameters:
        dataSetName - The name of the data set
        color - The color used in the chart for the data set.
        Returns:
        False if there is already a data set with the specified name, false otherwise.

      • chartSetOrderedDataSets

        public void chartSetOrderedDataSets(java.lang.Boolean ordered)
        Specifies if the data sets should be ordered by name. Default is the order by which they are added to the chart.
        Parameters:
        ordered - True or False.

      • chartClear

        public void chartClear()
        Clears the data of the chart.
